questions: 1. Which of the following attach is not used by LC4 to recover Windows password?
explanations: Explanation: LC4 is a password auditing and recovery tool; used for testing strength of a password and also helps in recovering lost Microsoft Windows passwords using a hybrid attack, brute-force attack as well as using a dictionary attack.

questions: 2. ____________ is the world’s most popular vulnerability scanner used in companies for checking vulnerabilities in the network.
explanations: Explanation: Nessus is a popular and proprietary network vulnerability scanning tool developed by Tenable Network Security. It helps in easily identifying vulnerabilities and fix them, which includes missing patches and software flaws.

questions: 3. _____________ is a tool which can detect registry issues in an operating system.
explanations: Explanation: LANguard Network Security Scanner helps in monitoring networks by scanning connected machines to provide information for every node. It can also be used for identifying registry issues.

questions: 4. Network Stumbler is a Windows Wi-Fi monitoring tool.
explanations: Explanation: Network Stumbler is a popular tool that helps in detecting WLANs and helps hackers in finding non-broadcasting wireless networks. It is popularly used as Wi-Fi scanning and monitoring tool for Windows.

Explanation: ToneLoc is a popular and primitive tool written for MS-DOS users. It is basically used by malicious attackers to guess user accounts, finding entry points in modems and locating modems connected in the network.

questions: 6. __________ is a debugger and exploration tool.
explanations: Explanation: Netcat is an easy Unix utility that helps in reading and writing data across network connections, using TCP or UDP protocol. It is popularly used as a debugger and exploration tool that is found free for Windows and Mac OS also.

questions: 7. __________ is a popular command-line packet analyser.
explanations: Explanation: Tcpdump is a popular command-line network packet analyzer. It allows its user in displaying TCP / IP as well as other data packets being transmitted or received over the computer network.

questions: 8. ________________ is a platform that essentially keeps the log of data from networks, devices as well as applications in a single location.
explanations: Explanation: EventLog Analyser is a tool that basically keeps the log of data from networks, devices as well as applications in a single location. Latest encryption techniques are used for securing its stored data.

questions: 9. ______________ is competent to restore corrupted Exchange Server Database files as well as recovering unapproachable mails in mailboxes.
explanations: Explanation: Mailbox Exchange Recovery is competent to restore corrupted Exchange Server Database files as well as recovering unapproachable mails in mailboxes. This tool is popularly used by ethical hackers and cyber-forensics investigators in recovering emails, calendars, attachments, contacts from inaccessible mail-servers.

questions: 10. ________________ helps in protecting businesses against data breaches that may make threats to cloud.
explanations: Explanation: Centrify helps in protecting businesses against data breaches that may make threats to the cloud. This is done by securing Centrify users by providing internal, external and privileged users.

questions: 11. __________ is a popular corporate security tool that is used to detect the attack on email with cloud only services.
explanations: Explanation: Proofpoint is a popular corporate security tool that is used to detect an attack on email with cloud-only services. It helps firms detect attack vectors and loopholes in different security systems through which attackers may gain access.

questions: 12. _____________ helps in protecting corporate data, communications and other assets.
explanations: Explanation: CipherCloud helps in protecting corporate data, different communications as well as other assets. This includes anti-virus scanning facility, encryption & traffic monitoring. In addition, it provides mobile security support also.
